    • Method Detail

      • showChildWindow

        public static void showChildWindow​(javafx.scene.Parent root,
                                   String title,
                                   int x,
                                   int y,
                                   boolean wait)
        Opens a child window. The value of all cells in column will be displayed in the currency.
        Parameters:
        root - The root from FXMLLoader.
        title - The title for the child window.
        x - The width of the child window, in pixels.
        y - The height of the child window, in pixels
        wait - Wait until window is closed before returning

      • displayErrorAlert

        public static void displayErrorAlert​(String title,
                                     String msg)
        Displays Error Alert.
        Parameters:
        title - A String containing the title for the Alert.
        msg - A String containing the message for the Alert.

      • itemStringConverter

        public static javafx.util.StringConverter itemStringConverter​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<? extends Item> items)
        Static Class to Override StringConverter for ObservableList(Item). Especially useful in ComboBox.

        A lambda expression is used in this method.

        The Stream API is used with the lambda expression in order to achieve higher efficiency through parallel execution.

        Parameters:
        items - The ObservableList to Override
        Returns:
        Returns new StringConverter. Overrides toString and fromString.

      • appointmentTypeStringConverter

        public static javafx.util.StringConverter appointmentTypeStringConverter​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> items)
        Static Class to Override StringConverter for ObservableList(Appointment). Returns String value of Type.

        A lambda expression is used in this method.

        The Stream API is used with the lambda expression in order to achieve higher efficiency through parallel execution.

        Parameters:
        items - The ObservableList to override.
        Returns:
        Returns new StringConverter. Overrides toString and fromString.

      • instantToTimestamp

        public static Timestamp instantToTimestamp​(Instant instant)
        Static Class to convert Instant to Timestamp.
        Parameters:
        instant - Instant to convert to Timestamp
        Returns:
        Returns Timestamp.

      • timestampToInstant

        public static Instant timestampToInstant​(Timestamp timestamp)
        Static Class to convert Timestamp to Instant.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - Timestamp to convert to Instant
        Returns:
        Returns Instant.

      • myParseInt

        public static int myParseInt​(String strNumber)
        Parses String to int. Returns -1 if String does not exclusively contain an integer.
        Parameters:
        strNumber - The String to convert to Double
        Returns:
        Returns Int if successful. Returns -1 on Failure.

      • toLocalDateTime

        public static void toLocalDateTime​(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Object,​Object> column)
        Formats TableColumn containing Instant to display in Local Time.

        A lambda expression is used in this method.

        A lambda expression is used in this method to simplify and cleanup the code.

        The value of all cells in column will be displayed in local Time.
        Parameters:
        column - The TableColumn to be displayed in Local Time.
